reviewText: My son enjoyed this, he is really into classic rock and this was entertaining for him.

Great film on; Guitar Hero History, with many specific interviews. There are actually 2 films with the second being about music in the 70s and Rock burns Disco in the end. This is a great gift for anyone who loves guitar players extraordinaire and or Rock.
I bought this as part of a birthday gift for a friend and he has watched it several times, was thrilled with the gift!

If you're a fan of great music, a fan of the 70's, & a fan of learning the details of what went into certain decisions in the making of great songs, great albums, & great promotional ideas - you'll really enjoy this!
Very informative, I knew most of the info. but, I shared with a friend and they loved it also. Rock Lives!
